title: FS: (7) T206 Red Portrait Cobb All diff backs
author: jthorst75

posts.post_title: FS: (7) T206 Red Portrait Cobb All diff backs
posts.post_content:
I have for sale seven T206 Ty Cobbs. All red portraits, all graded and all different backs. I started this collection last month and lost interest in finding more backs. Anyways looking to move on. Not willing to seperate or trade. Looking to get $4200 for the whole lot. Will take PP gift. Thanks for looking.
